entities.name: weasleys
entities.description: The Weasleys are trying to help Harry by flying up on their brooms. They try to pull him onto one of their brooms, but it's no good.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is in danger and the Weasleys are trying to help him by flying up on their brooms.

entities.name: marcus flint
entities.description: Marcus Flint is playing Quidditch and scores five times without anyone noticing.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione fights her way across the stand to get to Snape, knocks Professor Quirrell into the row in front, and then casts a spell on Snape.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is desperate and mutters for Hermione to come on.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is standing in the stand, and Hermione casts a spell on him that sets his robes on fire.

entities.name: professor quirrell
entities.description: Professor Quirrell is knocked into the row in front by Hermione.

relationships.description: The Weasleys are trying to help Harry by flying up on their brooms.
Hermione casts a spell on Snape that sets his robes on fire.
Ron is desperate and mutters for Hermione to come on.
Marcus Flint is playing Quidditch with the Quaffle.
